channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Tree planting request, 18th November
item.description:
Empty tree pit in pavement opposite 10 Church Avenue (other side of road) after tree was felled. Please can a replacement be planted. Thanks
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Church Avenue, Beckenham, London Borough of Bromley
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Flytipping not FIXED, 18th November
item.description:
Thank you for responding quickly to my report - however this was only partially removed as you can see from the new pics there is still a whole pile of wood and rubble dumped in the bin stall as well as on the path and street as originally shown an reported - we cannot use our bins - please arrange for them to return and finish the job -they only cleared the main pile in the road which also needs shoveling up to clear it as you can see in the pics. Thank you

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Elephant and Castle, London Borough of Southwark
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Empty tree pit, 18th November
item.description:
Tree was felled outside 13 Church Avenue leaving an empty tree pit marked by a wooden stake. Please can a new tree be planted. Thanks
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Church Avenue, Beckenham, London Borough of Bromley
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Dumped broken TV, 18th November

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Streatley Road, London

item.category: Fly-tip Small - Less than one bag

item.title: Leaking Fire Hydrant, 18th November
item.description:
The Fire Hydrant is leaking across the paved area. As we start to experience freezing temperatures, there is a risk it will freeze over forming "black ice". This represents a hazard for pedestrians, and cyclists who continue to cycle through Cutty Sark Gardens (despite it being a No Cycling area, and a danger to Pedestrians). Thank you

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Cutty Sark Gardens, Greenwich
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Building materials and household items dumped. There are various bits of rubbish dropped along this pathway. Slippery mud left by waterworks repairs other end of footpath outside 30 Edgehill Road, 18th November
item.description:
This footpath is constantly used as a dump. Please consider putting a sign up to deter this. It’s not fair that my neighbours and I pay our rates and yet when street cleaning is done our footpath is missed out.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 29,31, Imperial Way, London Borough of Bromley
Report on FixMyStreet

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Raleigh Road, Penge, London Borough of Bromley

item.title: Blocked drain been blocked for a long time., 18th November
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 18, Overcliff Road, Ladywell, Catford, London Borough of Lewisham

item.title: Overflowing rubbish bins at 46 ceres road, 18th November
item.description:
Since this property was turned into a HMO only a few weeks ago the bins have been overflowing and wrong items being left in the recycling bin resulting in them not being taken. Attracting vermin and overspilling rubbish onto the pavements.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Ceres Road, Plumstead
Report on FixMyStreet
